headline: Ariel Focus Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: In Q4 2024, Ariel Focus Fund outperformed the Russell 1000 Value Index, marginally falling -1.19% versus -1.98% for its primary benchmark. Click here to read the full commentary.
